completeCongratulations: Well done, you've matched all the cards!
continueNextGame: Click “Continue” to have another go and see whether you can beat your own score!
continueFinished:
You've now successfully completed this task!

secTitle: Thank you for completing the Memory Task!
thankYouMessage:
Well done on the memory task!
You have now completed all the tasks. Your data has been saved automatically, but please do not close the app yet.
followOnInstructions: You can tell the experimenter that you've finished with the app tasks and they will check that we have everything we need and give you any further instructions if needed.
